Container.Name: fail2ban
Container.Overview: Fail2ban(http://www.fail2ban.org/) is a daemon to ban hosts that cause multiple authentication errors.

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: Contains all relevant configuration files.

Config.Name: Path: /var/log
Config.Description: Host logs. Mounted as Read Only.
